Node._text: Oh… it’s you... Come to return my book, have you…?\n…\nNo...? Alright… well, did you want something important or......?

dialogueOption._text: Fork over your rent money my dear Deer!

Node._text: Oh... Right... If that's all then, I'm very busy, I don't have time to waste.
... Haven't heard that one before. You should tell your jokes to someone else now. I'm sure that otter boy will appreciate your level of humour.
